title: Public Service Announcement:  What kind of tent do I need at Burning Man?
author: Caveat Magister
content:
If you want to be comfortable at Burning Man, you need the right tent. Extreme environmental conditions out in the Black Rock Desert make most conventional tents not only useless, but a hazard to you and your fellow campers.

So what kind of tent are you looking for? What specifications should it meet? Don’t worry – we’ve got answers with this BMIR Public Service Announcement!! Listen below!

Want more PSAs, covering everything from coping with traffic to finding an orgy? No problem – they’re all archived here!
